part_full_text: In 2125, Earth’s society rested on a fragile <word id='_foundation' class='word-eng-link'>foundation</word>, divided into AI-augmented Elites, gene-edited Novus, and oppressed Naturals. Kael, a Natural, discovered a <word id='_conspicuous' class='word-eng-link'>conspicuous</word> signal from a buried lab that could <word id='_transform' class='word-eng-link'>transform</word> the caste hierarchy. Choosing to <word id='_embark_on' class='word-eng-link'>embark on</word> a mission, he faced Elites determined to <word id='_conserve' class='word-eng-link'>conserve</word> their power. Drones were deployed to <word id='_obstruct' class='word-eng-link'>obstruct</word> his path, but Mira, a Novus defector, saw her escape <word id='_coincide' class='word-eng-link'>coincide</word> with his quest. A <word id='_barrier' class='word-eng-link'>barrier</word> of distrust stood between them, yet their <word id='_mutual' class='word-eng-link'>mutual</word> survival forged an uneasy alliance in the <word id='_hinterland' class='word-eng-link'>hinterland</word>. Kael’s actions began to <word id='_justify' class='word-eng-link'>justify</word> rebellion, uncovering a <word id='_significant' class='word-eng-link'>significant</word> <word id='_antidote' class='word-eng-link'>antidote</word> to Elite control. The <word id='_massive' class='word-eng-link'>massive</word> Elite forces moved to <word id='_subdue' class='word-eng-link'>subdue</word> them, but their escape would <word id='_culminate' class='word-eng-link'>culminate</word> in a vow to <word id='_reinforce' class='word-eng-link'>reinforce</word> their fight. A <word id='_handful' class='word-eng-link'>handful</word> of Naturals began to <word id='_predict' class='word-eng-link'>predict</word> an uprising, their <word id='_unanimity' class='word-eng-link'>unanimity</word> a spark. Forging an <word id='_alloy' class='word-eng-link'>alloy</word> of trust, Kael and Mira <word id='_barely' class='word-eng-link'>barely</word> evaded capture, their <word id='_cohesion' class='word-eng-link'>cohesion</word> tested. Their paths <word id='_converge' class='word-eng-link'>converge</word> at an outpost where a <word id='_generous' class='word-eng-link'>generous</word> elder offered shelter. The Elites <word id='_blame' class='word-eng-link'>blame</word> Naturals for chaos, launching <word id='_chaotic' class='word-eng-link'>chaotic</word> raids. Kael’s team, with <word id='_adroit' class='word-eng-link'>adroit</word> tactics, aimed to <word id='_conceal' class='word-eng-link'>conceal</word> their plans and <word id='_incinerate' class='word-eng-link'>incinerate</word> Elite data banks, proving the rebellion’s potential.

story_sentences.english: Kael chose to <word id='_abandon' class='word-eng-link'>abandon</word> his quiet life for a dangerous mission.
story_sentences.korean: 케일은 조용한 삶을 <word id='_abandon' class='word-target-kr'>버리고</word> 위험한 임무를 택했다.

story_sentences.english: The lab held an <word id='_antidote' class='word-eng-link'>antidote</word> to the Elites’ genetic control.
story_sentences.korean: 연구소에는 엘리트의 유전자 통제를 막을 <word id='_antidote' class='word-target-kr'>치료법</word>이 있었다.

story_sentences.english: A <word id='_conspicuous' class='word-eng-link'>conspicuous</word> signal drew Kael to the ruins.
story_sentences.korean: <word id='_conspicuous' class='word-target-kr'>뚜렷한</word> 신호가 케일을 폐허로 이끌었다.

story_sentences.english: This discovery was <word id='_critical' class='word-eng-link'>critical</word> to the Naturals’ survival.
story_sentences.korean: 이 발견은 자연인들의 생존에 <word id='_critical' class='word-target-kr'>중요했다</word>.

story_sentences.english: Kael could <word id='_discriminate' class='word-eng-link'>discriminate</word> the signal’s unique frequency.
story_sentences.korean: 케일은 신호의 독특한 주파수를 <word id='_discriminate' class='word-target-kr'>구별할</word> 수 있었다.

story_sentences.english: The lab’s <word id='_dorsal' class='word-eng-link'>dorsal</word> structure was buried under rubble.
story_sentences.korean: 연구소의 <word id='_dorsal' class='word-target-kr'>등 부분</word> 구조는 잔해 아래 묻혀 있었다.

story_sentences.english: Kael aimed to <word id='_eliminate' class='word-eng-link'>eliminate</word> any trace of his presence.
story_sentences.korean: 케일은 자신의 흔적을 <word id='_eliminate' class='word-target-kr'>제거하려</word> 했다.

story_sentences.english: The signal seemed to <word id='_fuse' class='word-eng-link'>fuse</word> with ancient tech patterns.
story_sentences.korean: 신호는 고대 기술 패턴과 <word id='_fuse' class='word-target-kr'>융합된</word> 듯했다.

story_sentences.english: In the <word id='_hinterland' class='word-eng-link'>hinterland</word>, dangers were ever-present.
story_sentences.korean: <word id='_hinterland' class='word-target-kr'>배후지</word>에서는 위험이 항상 존재했다.

story_sentences.english: Kael’s <word id='_earnest' class='word-eng-link'>earnest</word> resolve inspired others.
story_sentences.korean: 케일의 <word id='_earnest' class='word-target-kr'>진지한</word> 결심은 다른 이들을 고무했다.

story_sentences.english: A sense of <word id='_kinship' class='word-eng-link'>kinship</word> grew among the Naturals.
story_sentences.korean: 자연인들 사이에 <word id='_kinship' class='word-target-kr'>혈연 관계</word> 같은 유대가 커졌다.

story_sentences.english: The lab was <word id='_laden' class='word-eng-link'>laden</word> with forgotten technology.
story_sentences.korean: 연구소는 잊힌 기술로 <word id='_laden' class='word-target-kr'>가득했다</word>.

story_sentences.english: Kael carried <word id='_lumber' class='word-eng-link'>lumber</word> to barricade the entrance.
story_sentences.korean: 케일은 입구를 막기 위해 <word id='_lumber' class='word-target-kr'>목재</word>를 나랐다.

story_sentences.english: The signal’s pattern seemed to <word id='_mirror' class='word-eng-link'>mirror</word> old Earth codes.
story_sentences.korean: 신호의 패턴은 오래된 지구 코드를 <word id='_mirror' class='word-target-kr'>반영하는</word> 듯했다.

story_sentences.english: Their <word id='_mutual' class='word-eng-link'>mutual</word> goal united Kael and Mira.
story_sentences.korean: 그들의 <word id='_mutual' class='word-target-kr'>상호적인</word> 목표는 케일과 미라를 하나로 묶었다.

story_sentences.english: The antidote was <word id='_obtainable' class='word-eng-link'>obtainable</word> but heavily guarded.
story_sentences.korean: 치료제는 <word id='_obtainable' class='word-target-kr'>손에 넣을 수 있었지만</word> 철저히 보호되고 있었다.

story_sentences.english: Kael had to <word id='_patch' class='word-eng-link'>patch</word> a broken console to access data.
story_sentences.korean: 케일은 데이터를 얻기 위해 고장난 콘솔을 <word id='_patch' class='word-target-kr'>수선했다</word>.

story_sentences.english: The Elites began to <word id='_protest' class='word-eng-link'>protest</word> the growing unrest.
story_sentences.korean: 엘리트들은 커져가는 소요에 <word id='_protest' class='word-target-kr'>항의하기</word> 시작했다.

story_sentences.english: Kael’s <word id='_rash' class='word-eng-link'>rash</word> move nearly exposed their position.
story_sentences.korean: 케일의 <word id='_rash' class='word-target-kr'>경솔한</word> 행동은 그들의 위치를 거의 노출시켰다.

story_sentences.english: He tried to <word id='_recall' class='word-eng-link'>recall</word> the lab’s layout from old maps.
story_sentences.korean: 그는 오래된 지도에서 연구소의 배치를 <word id='_recall' class='word-target-kr'>회상하려</word> 했다.

story_sentences.english: Mira could <word id='_recite' class='word-eng-link'>recite</word> the code to unlock the vault.
story_sentences.korean: 미라는 금고를 여는 코드를 <word id='_recite' class='word-target-kr'>암송할</word> 수 있었다.

story_sentences.english: They hoped to <word id='_regain' class='word-eng-link'>regain</word> control of their future.
story_sentences.korean: 그들은 미래를 <word id='_regain' class='word-target-kr'>되찾기를</word> 바랐다.

story_sentences.english: Kael worked to <word id='_reinforce' class='word-eng-link'>reinforce</word> the lab’s defenses.
story_sentences.korean: 케일은 연구소의 방어를 <word id='_reinforce' class='word-target-kr'>강화하기</word> 위해 일했다.

story_sentences.english: The signal was <word id='_relevant_to' class='word-eng-link'>relevant to</word> an ancient rebellion.
story_sentences.korean: 신호는 고대 반란과 <word id='_relevant_to' class='word-target-kr'>관련된</word> 것이었다.

story_sentences.english: Kael would <word id='_reminisce' class='word-eng-link'>reminisce</word> about freer days.
story_sentences.korean: 케일은 더 자유로웠던 날들을 <word id='_reminisce' class='word-target-kr'>회상하곤</word> 했다.

story_sentences.english: Some Naturals began to <word id='_repent' class='word-eng-link'>repent</word> their inaction.
story_sentences.korean: 일부 자연인들은 그들의 무활동을 <word id='_repent' class='word-target-kr'>후회하기</word> 시작했다.

story_sentences.english: Mira chose to <word id='_resign' class='word-eng-link'>resign</word> her loyalty to the Novus.
story_sentences.korean: 미라는 노부스에 대한 충성을 <word id='_resign' class='word-target-kr'>포기했다</word>.

story_sentences.english: The lab’s system could <word id='_secrete' class='word-eng-link'>secrete</word> the antidote formula.
story_sentences.korean: 연구소 시스템은 치료제 공식을 <word id='_secrete' class='word-target-kr'>분비할</word> 수 있었다.

story_sentences.english: Kael’s words helped <word id='_soothe' class='word-eng-link'>soothe</word> the group’s fears.
story_sentences.korean: 케일의 말은 그룹의 두려움을 <word id='_soothe' class='word-target-kr'>달래는</word> 데 도움이 됐다.

story_sentences.english: They decided to <word id='_stay' class='word-eng-link'>stay</word> in the lab overnight.
story_sentences.korean: 그들은 연구소에서 밤을 <word id='_stay' class='word-target-kr'>보내기로</word> 했다.

story_sentences.english: A <word id='_surplus' class='word-eng-link'>surplus</word> of data overwhelmed their systems.
story_sentences.korean: 데이터의 <word id='_surplus' class='word-target-kr'>잔여</word>가 그들의 시스템을 압도했다.

story_sentences.english: Kael had to <word id='_tear' class='word-eng-link'>tear</word> through old cables to proceed.
story_sentences.korean: 케일은 진행하기 위해 오래된 케이블을 <word id='_tear' class='word-target-kr'>찢어야</word> 했다.

story_sentences.english: The group would <word id='_swear' class='word-eng-link'>swear</word> to protect the antidote.
story_sentences.korean: 그룹은 치료제를 보호하기로 <word id='_swear' class='word-target-kr'>맹세했다</word>.

story_sentences.english: The lab’s <word id='_toothed' class='word-eng-link'>toothed</word> gears were still intact.
story_sentences.korean: 연구소의 <word id='_toothed' class='word-target-kr'>들쑥날쑥한</word> 기어는 여전히 온전했다.

story_sentences.english: This find could <word id='_transform' class='word-eng-link'>transform</word> their fight.
story_sentences.korean: 이 발견은 그들의 싸움을 <word id='_transform' class='word-target-kr'>변형시킬</word> 수 있었다.

story_sentences.english: Kael proved <word id='_trustworthy' class='word-eng-link'>trustworthy</word> to his allies.
story_sentences.korean: 케일은 동맹들에게 <word id='_trustworthy' class='word-target-kr'>믿을 수 있는</word> 사람임을 증명했다.

story_sentences.english: Their plan was <word id='_unbalanced' class='word-eng-link'>unbalanced</word> but bold.
story_sentences.korean: 그들의 계획은 <word id='_unbalanced' class='word-target-kr'>균형을 잃은</word> 것이었지만 대담했다.

story_sentences.english: The Elites’ <word id='_unrelenting' class='word-eng-link'>unrelenting</word> pursuit was daunting.
story_sentences.korean: 엘리트들의 <word id='_unrelenting' class='word-target-kr'>무자비한</word> 추격은 두려웠다.

story_sentences.english: Their <word id='_utilitarian' class='word-eng-link'>utilitarian</word> approach maximized efficiency.
story_sentences.korean: 그들의 <word id='_utilitarian' class='word-target-kr'>실용주의적인</word> 접근은 효율성을 극대화했다.

story_sentences.english: The <word id='_variety' class='word-eng-link'>variety</word> of threats kept them alert.
story_sentences.korean: 위협의 <word id='_variety' class='word-target-kr'>다양성</word>은 그들을 경계하게 했다.

story_sentences.english: Each <word id='_variety' class='word-eng-link'>variety</word> of code required a unique key.
story_sentences.korean: 각 <word id='_variety' class='word-target-kr'>종류</word>의 코드에는 고유한 키가 필요했다.

story_sentences.english: The signal’s <word id='_advantage' class='word-eng-link'>advantage</word> gave hope to the Naturals.
story_sentences.korean: 신호의 <word id='_advantage' class='word-target-kr'>이익</word>은 자연인들에게 희망을 주었다.

story_sentences.english: The unrest seemed to <word id='_arise_from' class='word-eng-link'>arise from</word> the lab’s discovery.
story_sentences.korean: 소요는 연구소의 발견에서 <word id='_arise_from' class='word-target-kr'>기인한</word> 듯했다.

story_sentences.english: A <word id='_barrier' class='word-eng-link'>barrier</word> of drones blocked their escape.
story_sentences.korean: 드론의 <word id='_barrier' class='word-target-kr'>장애물</word>이 그들의 탈출을 막았다.

story_sentences.english: Mira feared Kael might <word id='_betray' class='word-eng-link'>betray</word> her to the Elites.
story_sentences.korean: 미라는 케일이 자신을 엘리트에게 <word id='_betray' class='word-target-kr'>배신할</word>까 봐 두려웠다.

story_sentences.english: They used ropes to <word id='_bind' class='word-eng-link'>bind</word> a broken gate shut.
story_sentences.korean: 그들은 밧줄로 부서진 문을 <word id='_bind' class='word-target-kr'>묶었다</word>.

story_sentences.english: Dust clouds would <word id='_blur' class='word-eng-link'>blur</word> the drones’ sensors.
story_sentences.korean: 먼지 구름은 드론의 센서를 <word id='_blur' class='word-target-kr'>흐리게</word> 했다.

story_sentences.english: They had to <word id='_circumvent' class='word-eng-link'>circumvent</word> a guarded checkpoint.
story_sentences.korean: 그들은 경비가 삼엄한 검문소를 <word id='_circumvent' class='word-target-kr'>우회해야</word> 했다.

story_sentences.english: Kael’s <word id='_clumsy' class='word-eng-link'>clumsy</word> attempt at stealth nearly failed.
story_sentences.korean: 케일의 <word id='_clumsy' class='word-target-kr'>서투른</word> 은신 시도는 거의 실패할 뻔했다.

story_sentences.english: Their escape would <word id='_commence' class='word-eng-link'>commence</word> at dawn.
story_sentences.korean: 그들의 탈출은 새벽에 <word id='_commence' class='word-target-kr'>시작될</word> 것이었다.

story_sentences.english: Kael’s <word id='_conduct' class='word-eng-link'>conduct</word> earned Mira’s trust.
story_sentences.korean: 케일의 <word id='_conduct' class='word-target-kr'>행동</word>은 미라의 신뢰를 얻었다.

story_sentences.english: They aimed to <word id='_conserve' class='word-eng-link'>conserve</word> their limited supplies.
story_sentences.korean: 그들은 제한된 물자를 <word id='_conserve' class='word-target-kr'>보존하려</word> 했다.

story_sentences.english: A <word id='_contradiction' class='word-eng-link'>contradiction</word> in Elite orders caused confusion.
story_sentences.korean: 엘리트 명령의 <word id='_contradiction' class='word-target-kr'>모순</word>은 혼란을 일으켰다.

story_sentences.english: Their efforts would <word id='_culminate' class='word-eng-link'>culminate</word> in a bold strike.
story_sentences.korean: 그들의 노력은 대담한 공격으로 <word id='_culminate' class='word-target-kr'>끝날</word> 것이었다.

story_sentences.english: Mira helped <word id='_delineate' class='word-eng-link'>delineate</word> the lab’s blueprint.
story_sentences.korean: 미라는 연구소 청사진의 <word id='_delineate' class='word-target-kr'>윤곽을 그리는</word> 데 도움을 주었다.

story_sentences.english: A <word id='_donation' class='word-eng-link'>donation</word> of tools came from a sympathizer.
story_sentences.korean: 동조자로부터 도구의 <word id='_donation' class='word-target-kr'>기증</word>이 도착했다.

story_sentences.english: Kael and Mira would <word id='_embark_on' class='word-eng-link'>embark on</word> a new phase of their plan.
story_sentences.korean: 케일과 미라는 계획의 새 단계를 <word id='_embark_on' class='word-target-kr'>시작할</word> 것이었다.

story_sentences.english: Society’s <word id='_foundation' class='word-eng-link'>foundation</word> was cracking under rebellion.
story_sentences.korean: 사회의 <word id='_foundation' class='word-target-kr'>기초</word>는 반란으로 균열이 가고 있었다.

story_sentences.english: Their <word id='_fundamental' class='word-eng-link'>fundamental</word> goal was freedom.
story_sentences.korean: 그들의 <word id='_fundamental' class='word-target-kr'>근본적인</word> 목표는 자유였다.

story_sentences.english: A <word id='_handful' class='word-eng-link'>handful</word> of Naturals joined their cause.
story_sentences.korean: <word id='_handful' class='word-target-kr'>소수의</word> 자연인들이 그들의 대의에 합류했다.

story_sentences.english: Their resistance reached a new <word id='_height' class='word-eng-link'>height</word> of intensity.
story_sentences.korean: 그들의 저항은 새로운 <word id='_height' class='word-target-kr'>절정</word>에 도달했다.

story_sentences.english: Their strategies were <word id='_identical' class='word-eng-link'>identical</word> in purpose.
story_sentences.korean: 그들의 전략은 목적에서 <word id='_identical' class='word-target-kr'>동일했다</word>.

story_sentences.english: Drones were an <word id='_impediment' class='word-eng-link'>impediment</word> to their progress.
story_sentences.korean: 드론은 그들의 진전에 <word id='_impediment' class='word-target-kr'>장애</word>였다.

story_sentences.english: Kael’s actions helped <word id='_justify' class='word-eng-link'>justify</word> their rebellion.
story_sentences.korean: 케일의 행동은 그들의 반란을 <word id='_justify' class='word-target-kr'>정당화하는</word> 데 도움이 됐다.

story_sentences.english: Some Naturals would <word id='_lament' class='word-eng-link'>lament</word> their lost safety.
story_sentences.korean: 일부 자연인들은 잃어버린 안전을 <word id='_lament' class='word-target-kr'>슬퍼했다</word>.

story_sentences.english: The lab housed a <word id='_microorganism' class='word-eng-link'>microorganism</word> for the antidote.
story_sentences.korean: 연구소에는 치료제를 위한 <word id='_microorganism' class='word-target-kr'>미생물</word>이 있었다.

story_sentences.english: Mira’s <word id='_moody' class='word-eng-link'>moody</word> demeanor hid her resolve.
story_sentences.korean: 미라의 <word id='_moody' class='word-target-kr'>우울한</word> 태도는 그녀의 결심을 숨겼다.

story_sentences.english: The signal’s <word id='_origin' class='word-eng-link'>origin</word> was a pre-war lab.

story_sentences.korean: 반군들은 대의에 자신의 기술을 <word id='_offer' class='word-target-kr'>제공할</word> 것이었다.

story_sentences.english: They fought <word id='_on_occasion' class='word-eng-link'>on occasion</word> with drones.
story_sentences.korean: 그들은 <word id='_on_occasion' class='word-target-kr'>가끔</word> 드론과 싸웠다.

story_sentences.english: Many began to <word id='_oppose' class='word-eng-link'>oppose</word> Elite rule openly.
story_sentences.korean: 많은 이들이 엘리트 통치를 공개적으로 <word id='_oppose' class='word-target-kr'>반대하기</word> 시작했다.

story_sentences.english: Kael had to <word id='_pare' class='word-eng-link'>pare</word> down their supplies.
story_sentences.korean: 케일은 물자를 <word id='_pare' class='word-target-kr'>삭감해야</word> 했다.

story_sentences.english: The mission held great <word id='_peril' class='word-eng-link'>peril</word> for all.
story_sentences.korean: 임무는 모두에게 큰 <word id='_peril' class='word-target-kr'>위기를</word> 안겼다.

story_sentences.english: The hub was <word id='_predominately' class='word-eng-link'>predominately</word> AI-controlled.
story_sentences.korean: 허브는 <word id='_predominately' class='word-target-kr'>주로</word> AI로 통제되었다.

story_sentences.english: The attack would <word id='_refract' class='word-eng-link'>refract</word> Elite attention.
story_sentences.korean: 공격은 엘리트의 주의를 <word id='_refract' class='word-target-kr'>굴절시킬</word> 것이었다.

story_sentences.english: Kael’s plan would <word id='_render' class='word-eng-link'>render</word> the hub useless.
story_sentences.korean: 케일의 계획은 허브를 <word id='_render' class='word-target-kr'>표현할</word> 수 없게 만들 것이다.

story_sentences.english: They would <word id='_render' class='word-eng-link'>render</word> aid to injured rebels.
story_sentences.korean: 그들은 부상당한 반군에게 도움을 <word id='_render' class='word-target-kr'>줄</word> 것이었다.

story_sentences.english: Kael’s <word id='_renown' class='word-eng-link'>renown</word> grew among rebels.
story_sentences.korean: 케일의 <word id='_renown' class='word-target-kr'>명성</word>은 반군 사이에서 커졌다.

story_sentences.english: They aimed to <word id='_repel' class='word-eng-link'>repel</word> a drone assault.
story_sentences.korean: 그들은 드론 공격을 <word id='_repel' class='word-target-kr'>물리치려</word> 했다.

story_sentences.english: They worked to <word id='_restore' class='word-eng-link'>restore</word> an old comms system.
story_sentences.korean: 그들은 오래된 통신 시스템을 <word id='_restore' class='word-target-kr'>복구하려</word> 했다.

story_sentences.english: The hub’s <word id='_sanitation' class='word-eng-link'>sanitation</word> systems were offline.
story_sentences.korean: 허브의 <word id='_sanitation' class='word-target-kr'>공중위생</word> 시스템은 꺼져 있었다.

story_sentences.english: Victory had a <word id='_savor' class='word-eng-link'>savor</word> of hope.
story_sentences.korean: 승리는 희망의 <word id='_savor' class='word-target-kr'>맛</word>을 주었다.

story_sentences.english: They had to <word id='_spare' class='word-eng-link'>spare</word> their energy for the fight.
story_sentences.korean: 그들은 싸움을 위해 에너지를 <word id='_spare' class='word-target-kr'>절약해야</word> 했다.

story_sentences.english: Kael would <word id='_spare' class='word-eng-link'>spare</word> time to plan.
story_sentences.korean: 케일은 계획을 세우기 위해 시간을 <word id='_spare' class='word-target-kr'>할애할</word> 것이었다.

story_sentences.english: The attack was <word id='_stimulating' class='word-eng-link'>stimulating</word> to their morale.
story_sentences.korean: 공격은 그들의 사기에 <word id='_stimulating' class='word-target-kr'>활기를 주는</word> 것이었다.

story_sentences.english: Kael’s actions would <word id='_typify' class='word-eng-link'>typify</word> the rebellion.
story_sentences.korean: 케일의 행동은 반란을 <word id='_typify' class='word-target-kr'>대표할</word> 것이었다.

story_sentences.english: The <word id='_wholesale' class='word-eng-link'>wholesale</word> destruction of drones was key.
story_sentences.korean: 드론의 <word id='_wholesale' class='word-target-kr'>대규모</word> 파괴가 핵심이었다.

story_sentences.english: <word id='_yet' class='word-eng-link'>yet</word>, the Elites remained a threat.
story_sentences.korean: <word id='_yet' class='word-target-kr'>그럼에도 불구하고</word>, 엘리트들은 여전히 위협이었다.

story_sentences.english: Kael’s team grew to <word id='_admire' class='word-eng-link'>admire</word> his leadership.
story_sentences.korean: 케일의 팀은 그의 리더십을 <word id='_admire' class='word-target-kr'>존경하기</word> 시작했다.

story_sentences.english: His <word id='_adroit' class='word-eng-link'>adroit</word> tactics outsmarted drones.
story_sentences.korean: 그의 <word id='_adroit' class='word-target-kr'>능숙한</word> 전술은 드론을 능가했다.

story_sentences.english: Mira felt <word id='_ambivalent' class='word-eng-link'>ambivalent</word> about the rebellion’s cost.
story_sentences.korean: 미라는 반란의 대가에 대해 <word id='_ambivalent' class='word-target-kr'>불확실한</word> 감정을 느꼈다.

story_sentences.english: An Elite spy tried to <word id='_cheat' class='word-eng-link'>cheat</word> their system.
story_sentences.korean: 엘리트 스파이는 그들의 시스템을 <word id='_cheat' class='word-target-kr'>속이려</word> 했다.

story_sentences.english: Kael remained <word id='_composed' class='word-eng-link'>composed</word> under pressure.
story_sentences.korean: 케일은 압박 속에서도 <word id='_composed' class='word-target-kr'>차분했다</word>.

story_sentences.english: The plan was <word id='_composed' class='word-eng-link'>composed</word> with great care.
story_sentences.korean: 계획은 매우 신중히 <word id='_composed' class='word-target-kr'>작성되었다</word>.

story_sentences.english: They had to <word id='_conceal' class='word-eng-link'>conceal</word> their movements.
story_sentences.korean: 그들은 움직임을 <word id='_conceal' class='word-target-kr'>숨겨야</word> 했다.

story_sentences.english: The plan’s <word id='_conciseness' class='word-eng-link'>conciseness</word> ensured clarity.
story_sentences.korean: 계획의 <word id='_conciseness' class='word-target-kr'>간결함</word>은 명확성을 보장했다.

story_sentences.english: Kael’s <word id='_deliberate' class='word-eng-link'>deliberate</word> pace avoided errors.
story_sentences.korean: 케일의 <word id='_deliberate' class='word-target-kr'>신중한</word> 속도는 오류를 피했다.

story_sentences.english: The attack was <word id='_deliberate' class='word-eng-link'>deliberate</word> and planned.
story_sentences.korean: 공격은 <word id='_deliberate' class='word-target-kr'>의도적이고</word> 계획된 것이었다.

story_sentences.english: The hub’s core began to <word id='_glow' class='word-eng-link'>glow</word> as they attacked.
story_sentences.korean: 그들이 공격하자 허브의 핵심이 <word id='_glow' class='word-target-kr'>빛나기</word> 시작했다.

story_sentences.english: A <word id='_hiatus' class='word-eng-link'>hiatus</word> in patrols gave them time.
story_sentences.korean: 순찰의 <word id='_hiatus' class='word-target-kr'>틈</word>은 그들에게 시간을 주었다.

story_sentences.english: They aimed to <word id='_incinerate' class='word-eng-link'>incinerate</word> the hub’s data.
story_sentences.korean: 그들은 허브의 데이터를 <word id='_incinerate' class='word-target-kr'>태우려</word> 했다.

story_sentences.english: The Elites’ <word id='_indignity' class='word-eng-link'>indignity</word> fueled rebellion.
story_sentences.korean: 엘리트의 <word id='_indignity' class='word-target-kr'>모욕</word>은 반란을 부추겼다.

story_sentences.english: The hub’s systems were <word id='_inert' class='word-eng-link'>inert</word> after the attack.
story_sentences.korean: 공격 후 허브의 시스템은 <word id='_inert' class='word-target-kr'>비활성</word> 상태였다.

story_sentences.english: The mission was a heavy <word id='_load' class='word-eng-link'>load</word> on Kael.
story_sentences.korean: 임무는 케일에게 무거운 <word id='_load' class='word-target-kr'>부담</word>이었다.

story_sentences.english: Victory’s <word id='_luster' class='word-eng-link'>luster</word> was fleeting.
story_sentences.korean: 승리의 <word id='_luster' class='word-target-kr'>광채</word>는 잠깐이었다.

story_sentences.english: The hub was <word id='_massive' class='word-eng-link'>massive</word> but vulnerable.
story_sentences.korean: 허브는 <word id='_massive' class='word-target-kr'>육중했지만</word> 취약했다.

story_sentences.english: They aimed to <word id='_occupy' class='word-eng-link'>occupy</word> the hub briefly.
story_sentences.korean: 그들은 허브를 잠시 <word id='_occupy' class='word-target-kr'>점유하려</word> 했다.

story_sentences.english: Kael worked to <word id='_polish' class='word-eng-link'>polish</word> their strategy.
story_sentences.korean: 케일은 전략을 <word id='_polish' class='word-target-kr'>광내기</word> 위해 노력했다.

story_sentences.english: Their attack would <word id='_precede' class='word-eng-link'>precede</word> a larger strike.
story_sentences.korean: 그들의 공격은 더 큰 공격에 <word id='_precede' class='word-target-kr'>앞설</word> 것이었다.

story_sentences.english: Kael’s actions would <word id='_prove' class='word-eng-link'>prove</word> their strength.
story_sentences.korean: 케일의 행동은 그들의 힘을 <word id='_prove' class='word-target-kr'>입증할</word> 것이었다.

story_sentences.english: They had to <word id='_purchase' class='word-eng-link'>purchase</word> time with stealth.
story_sentences.korean: 그들은 은신으로 시간을 <word id='_purchase' class='word-target-kr'>사야</word> 했다.

story_sentences.english: The outpost remained <word id='_restful' class='word-eng-link'>restful</word> despite chaos.
story_sentences.korean: 전초기지는 혼란에도 <word id='_restful' class='word-target-kr'>편안했다</word>.

story_sentences.english: They aimed to <word id='_restrict' class='word-eng-link'>restrict</word> Elite communications.
story_sentences.korean: 그들은 엘리트 통신을 <word id='_restrict' class='word-target-kr'>제한하려</word> 했다.

story_sentences.english: A <word id='_rupture' class='word-eng-link'>rupture</word> in the hub’s core was key.
story_sentences.korean: 허브 핵심의 <word id='_rupture' class='word-target-kr'>파열</word>이 핵심이었다.

story_sentences.english: Their <word id='_scrutiny' class='word-eng-link'>scrutiny</word> of the hub revealed flaws.
story_sentences.korean: 허브에 대한 그들의 <word id='_scrutiny' class='word-target-kr'>정밀조사</word>는 결함을 드러냈다.

story_sentences.english: The plan’s <word id='_seductive' class='word-eng-link'>seductive</word> simplicity drew support.
story_sentences.korean: 계획의 <word id='_seductive' class='word-target-kr'>매혹적인</word> 단순성은 지지를 끌었다.

story_sentences.english: Data began to <word id='_seep' class='word-eng-link'>seep</word> from the hub’s systems.
story_sentences.korean: 데이터가 허브 시스템에서 <word id='_seep' class='word-target-kr'>스며나오기</word> 시작했다.

story_sentences.english: They aimed to <word id='_shatter' class='word-eng-link'>shatter</word> the hub’s control.
story_sentences.korean: 그들은 허브의 통제를 <word id='_shatter' class='word-target-kr'>박살 내려</word> 했다.

story_sentences.english: The attack would <word id='_shock' class='word-eng-link'>shock</word> the Elites.
story_sentences.korean: 공격은 엘리트들에게 <word id='_shock' class='word-target-kr'>충격을 줄</word> 것이었다.

story_sentences.english: The victory was <word id='_significant' class='word-eng-link'>significant</word> for rebels.
story_sentences.korean: 승리는 반군에게 <word id='_significant' class='word-target-kr'>중요했다</word>.

story_sentences.english: Kael carried a <word id='_slab' class='word-eng-link'>slab</word> to block a door.
story_sentences.korean: 케일은 문을 막기 위해 <word id='_slab' class='word-target-kr'>조각</word>을 나랐다.

story_sentences.english: The Elites threatened to <word id='_slaughter' class='word-eng-link'>slaughter</word> rebels.
story_sentences.korean: 엘리트들은 반군을 <word id='_slaughter' class='word-target-kr'>학살하겠다고</word> 위협했다.

story_sentences.english: The <word id='_strife' class='word-eng-link'>strife</word> unified the rebels.
story_sentences.korean: <word id='_strife' class='word-target-kr'>싸움</word>은 반군을 단결시켰다.

story_sentences.english: Kael would <word id='_summon' class='word-eng-link'>summon</word> more allies.
story_sentences.korean: 케일은 더 많은 동맹을 <word id='_summon' class='word-target-kr'>소환할</word> 것이었다.

story_sentences.english: Their <word id='_sustained' class='word-eng-link'>sustained</word> effort paid off.
story_sentences.korean: 그들의 <word id='_sustained' class='word-target-kr'>지속적인</word> 노력은 결실을 맺었다.

story_sentences.english: Kael’s <word id='_temperance' class='word-eng-link'>temperance</word> kept them focused.
story_sentences.korean: 케일의 <word id='_temperance' class='word-target-kr'>절제</word>는 그들을 집중하게 했다.

story_sentences.english: The hub’s <word id='_tremendous' class='word-eng-link'>tremendous</word> power was fading.
story_sentences.korean: 허브의 <word id='_tremendous' class='word-target-kr'>엄청난</word> 힘은 약해지고 있었다.

story_sentences.english: Their victory was <word id='_vivid' class='word-eng-link'>vivid</word> in rebel hearts.
story_sentences.korean: 그들의 승리는 반군의 마음에 <word id='_vivid' class='word-target-kr'>생생했다</word>.
